title: sarasija bhavajAyE sarasvati namOstutE
sahitya:
sarasija bhavajAyE sarasvati namOstutE sarvadA sadA padAravindam smarAmyaham


anupallavi

  para mudAkaram dEhi dEvI paripAhi dhAratI bhAratI sannidhAriNI parAtpari


caraNam    sharadindu mukhE sumukhE gAnanandAva ramita sadguru sanandanAdi samstuta vidaLE
parama lalita vINAdayitE sujanahitE kAmitaphaladE nEmita phaladE kalpalatE puradE
